====Usage notes====
When used as a left Chinese radical, Japanese [[shinjitai]] and traditional Chinese use a compressed form of 糸 (with [[小]] on the bottom), with traditional Chinese also using [[糹]] (with three dots on the bottom), and simplified Chinese uses [[纟]] (with [[一]] on the bottom).
